-- | A haskell wrapper for PokeAPI.co (www.pokeapi.co)
--   
@package haskmon
@version 0.1.0.0

module Haskmon.Resource

-- | GET the resource from the URI and parse it into one of the
--   <a>Haskmon.Types</a>. Fails if the parsing fails (ie: the library
--   needs to be updated).
getResource :: FromJSON a => Uri -> IO a

module Haskmon.Types.Internals

-- | Metadata that all resources (except Pokedex) have in common
data MetaData
MetaData :: String -> UTCTime -> UTCTime -> MetaData
resourceUri :: MetaData -> String
created :: MetaData -> UTCTime
modified :: MetaData -> UTCTime
getMetadata :: Object -> Parser MetaData
withO :: Value -> (Object -> Parser a) -> Parser a
data Pokedex
Pokedex :: String -> [MetaPokemon] -> Pokedex
pokedexName :: Pokedex -> String
pokedexPokemons :: Pokedex -> [MetaPokemon]
data MetaPokemon
MetaPokemon :: String -> IO Pokemon -> MetaPokemon
mPokemonName :: MetaPokemon -> String
getPokemon :: MetaPokemon -> IO Pokemon
data Pokemon
Pokemon :: String -> Word -> [MetaAbility] -> [MetaMove] -> [MetaType] -> Word -> [MetaEggGroup] -> Word -> Word -> Word -> Word -> Word -> Word -> Word -> [MetaSprite] -> [MetaDescription] -> MetaData -> Pokemon
pokemonName :: Pokemon -> String
pokemonNationalId :: Pokemon -> Word
pokemonAbilities :: Pokemon -> [MetaAbility]
pokemonMoves :: Pokemon -> [MetaMove]
pokemonTypes :: Pokemon -> [MetaType]
pokemonEggCycle :: Pokemon -> Word
pokemonEggGroups :: Pokemon -> [MetaEggGroup]
pokemonCatchRate :: Pokemon -> Word
pokemonHp :: Pokemon -> Word
pokemonAttack :: Pokemon -> Word
pokemonDefense :: Pokemon -> Word
pokemonSpAtk :: Pokemon -> Word
pokemonSpDef :: Pokemon -> Word
pokemonSpeed :: Pokemon -> Word
pokemonSprites :: Pokemon -> [MetaSprite]
pokemonDescriptions :: Pokemon -> [MetaDescription]
pokemonMetadata :: Pokemon -> MetaData
data MetaAbility
MetaAbility :: String -> IO Ability -> MetaAbility
mAbilityName :: MetaAbility -> String
getAbility :: MetaAbility -> IO Ability
data Ability
Ability :: String -> String -> MetaData -> Ability
abilityName :: Ability -> String
abilityDescription :: Ability -> String
abilityMetadata :: Ability -> MetaData
data MetaType
MetaType :: String -> IO Type -> MetaType
mTypeName :: MetaType -> String
getType :: MetaType -> IO Type
data Type
Type :: String -> [Type] -> [Type] -> [Type] -> [Type] -> [Type] -> MetaData -> Type
typeName :: Type -> String
typeIneffective :: Type -> [Type]
typeNoEffect :: Type -> [Type]
typeResistance :: Type -> [Type]
typeSuperEffective :: Type -> [Type]
typeWeakness :: Type -> [Type]
typeMetadata :: Type -> MetaData
data MetaMoveLearnType
LevelUp :: Int -> MetaMoveLearnType
Machine :: MetaMoveLearnType
Tutor :: MetaMoveLearnType
EggMove :: MetaMoveLearnType
Other :: MetaMoveLearnType
data MetaMove
MetaMove :: String -> MetaMoveLearnType -> IO Move -> MetaMove
mMoveName :: MetaMove -> String
mMoveLearnType :: MetaMove -> MetaMoveLearnType
getMove :: MetaMove -> IO Move
data Move
Move :: String -> Word -> Word -> Word -> MetaData -> Move
moveName :: Move -> String
movePower :: Move -> Word
movePp :: Move -> Word
moveAccuracy :: Move -> Word
moveMetadata :: Move -> MetaData
data MetaEggGroup
MetaEggGroup :: String -> IO EggGroup -> MetaEggGroup
mEggGroupName :: MetaEggGroup -> String
getEggGroup :: MetaEggGroup -> IO EggGroup
data EggGroup
EggGroup :: String -> [MetaPokemon] -> MetaData -> EggGroup
eggGroupName :: EggGroup -> String
eggGroupPokemons :: EggGroup -> [MetaPokemon]
eggGroupMetadata :: EggGroup -> MetaData
data MetaDescription
MetaDescription :: String -> IO Description -> MetaDescription
mDescriptionName :: MetaDescription -> String
getDescriptions :: MetaDescription -> IO Description
data Description
Description :: String -> String -> [MetaGame] -> MetaPokemon -> MetaData -> Description
descriptionName :: Description -> String
descriptionText :: Description -> String
descriptionGames :: Description -> [MetaGame]
descriptionPokemon :: Description -> MetaPokemon
descriptionMetadata :: Description -> MetaData
data MetaGame
MetaGame :: String -> IO Game -> MetaGame
mGameName :: MetaGame -> String
getGame :: MetaGame -> IO Game
data Game
Game :: String -> Word -> Word -> MetaData -> Game
gameName :: Game -> String
gameGeneration :: Game -> Word
gameReleaseYear :: Game -> Word
gameMetadata :: Game -> MetaData
data MetaSprite
MetaSprite :: String -> IO Sprite -> MetaSprite
mSpriteName :: MetaSprite -> String
getSprite :: MetaSprite -> IO Sprite
data Sprite
Sprite :: String -> MetaPokemon -> String -> Sprite
spriteName :: Sprite -> String
spritePokemon :: Sprite -> MetaPokemon
spriteImage :: Sprite -> String
instance Show MetaData
instance Show Ability
instance Show Type
instance Show MetaMoveLearnType
instance Show Move
instance Show Game
instance Show Sprite
instance Show Pokemon
instance Show Description
instance Show EggGroup
instance FromJSON Sprite
instance FromJSON MetaSprite
instance Show MetaSprite
instance FromJSON Game
instance FromJSON MetaGame
instance Show MetaGame
instance FromJSON MetaDescription
instance FromJSON Description
instance Show MetaDescription
instance FromJSON MetaEggGroup
instance FromJSON EggGroup
instance Show MetaEggGroup
instance FromJSON MetaMove
instance FromJSON Move
instance Show MetaMove
instance FromJSON MetaType
instance FromJSON Type
instance Show MetaType
instance FromJSON MetaAbility
instance FromJSON Ability
instance Show MetaAbility
instance FromJSON Pokemon
instance Show MetaPokemon
instance FromJSON Pokedex
instance FromJSON MetaPokemon
instance Show Pokedex

module Haskmon.Types

module Haskmon.Client

-- | Get a pokedex. Warning: returns a large list of pokemon resources
getPokedexById :: ID -> IO Pokedex
getNationalPokedex :: IO Pokedex

-- | Get a pokemon by ID
getPokemonById :: ID -> IO Pokemon

-- | Lookup a pokemon by name in the national pokedex WARNING: Calls the
--   pokedex api which returns a big list. It then does a lookup by name on
--   said list.
getPokemonByName :: String -> IO (Maybe Pokemon)

-- | Get an ability by ID
getAbilityById :: ID -> IO Ability

-- | Get a move by ID
getMoveById :: ID -> IO Move

-- | Get a type by ID
getTypeById :: ID -> IO Type

-- | Get a egg group by ID
getEggGroupById :: ID -> IO EggGroup

-- | Get a description group by ID
getDescriptionById :: ID -> IO Description

-- | Get a game by ID
getGameById :: ID -> IO Description

-- | Get Sprite by ID
getSpriteById :: ID -> IO Sprite


-- | Examples:
--   
--   <pre>
--   &gt;&gt;&gt; import Haskmon
--   
--   &gt;&gt;&gt; getPokemonByName "eevee" :: IO (Maybe Pokemon)
--   Just (Pokemon {pokemonName = "Eevee", pokemonNationalId = 133, ... })
--   
--   &gt;&gt;&gt; getMoveById 1 :: IO Move
--   Move {moveName = "Pound", movePower = 40, movePp = 35, moveAccuracy = 100, moveMetadata = MetaData {resourceUri = "/api/v1/move/1/", created = 2013-11-03 15:06:09.478009 UTC, modified = 2013-12-24 15:24:29.625596 UTC}}
--   </pre>
--   
--   For a full list of types (pokemons, moves, abilities, etc) see
--   <a>Haskmon.Types</a>. For a full list of getter functions, see
--   <a>Haskmon.Client</a>.
module Haskmon
